DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study establish national pediatric obesity registry know POWER ( Pediatric Obesity Weight Evaluation Registry ) . This registry contain clinical data individual comprehensive pediatric weight management program around United States overweight obese youth .
DOC.brief_title: Pediatric Obesity Weight Evaluation Registry ( POWER ) Study
